T02D2145:220a-1: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yurdzny'a na s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2145:220a-3: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2145:220a-4: mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2145:220a-6: bsod nams tshogs ni sngon song bas //
T02D2145:220a-7: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2145:220a-8: rang gi snying ga'i hr'i: dmar las //
T02D2145:220a-9: ye shes me 'bar rnam smin bsregs //
T02D2145:220a-10: de rjes rang sems thig le dang //
T02D2145:220a-11: hr'i: dmar tsheg drag gyur pa las //
T02D2145:220a-12: rta mchog spyan gsum zhal bgrad pa //
T02D2145:220a-14: de yi thugs kar pad zla'i steng //
T02D2145:220a-15: hr'i: las bcom ldan tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:220a-16: mdog dmar rgyan mdzes bum pa bsnams //
T02D2145:220a-17: thugs kar pad zla'i steng du hr'i: //
T02D2145:220a-18: de las bhr'um chad 'khor lo ni //
T02D2145:220a-19: rtsibs brgyad yongs su gyur ba las //
T02D2145:220b-0: @220b gzhal yas grub bzhi sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2145:220b-1: 'dab brgyad khyams dang pad ra dang //
T02D2145:220b-2: 'dod yon pha gu dra phyed dang //
T02D2145:220b-3: rta babs mchod rten yongs mdzes pa //
T02D2145:220b-4: rdo rje me ri dmar smug 'khrug / dangs shid thogs pa med pa yi //
T02D2145:220b-6: de yang hr'i: las pho brang gi / dbus su sam cig chad pa las //
T02D2145:220b-7: mi 'jigs brgyad du gyur par bsgom //
T02D2145:220b-8: de steng pam aa ram chad pas //
T02D2145:220b-9: pad zla rta bdun dag tu 'gyur //
T02D2145:220b-10: de yi steng du hr'i: las ni //
T02D2145:220b-13: de las bcom ldan tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:220b-14: mdog dmar gzhon sgeg rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D2145:220b-15: 'og rnams re skong dpag bsam shing //
T02D2145:220b-16: bum pa'i kha rgyan thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2145:220b-18: de yi g-yon du pam dang aa //
T02D2145:220b-19: gyur pas zla ba'i gdan stengs su //
T02D2145:220b-20: aa las yum mchog gos dkar mo //
T02D2145:220b-21: mtshal mdog 'gying bcas 'dzum zhing sgeg / thugs kar padma r'a ga yi //
T02D2145:220b-23: shar du pad zla nyi ma yi //
T02D2145:220b-24: steng du h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2145:220b-25: de las mi bskyod tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:220b-26: bee d'ur sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba //
T02D2145:220b-27: skyil krung dang bcas bum pa 'dzin //
T02D2145:220b-28: de yi g-yon du pad zla'i steng//
T02D2145:220b-29: sa las yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan //
T02D2145:220b-30: mdog dkar phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams //
T02D2145:220b-31: gzhon sgeg skyil krung bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2145:220b-32: lho ru padma nyi zla'i stengs //
T02D2145:220b-33: sva las rin 'byung tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:220b-34: btso ma gser mdog skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2145:220b-35: bum 'dzin rin chen rgyang yis spras //
T02D2145:220b-36: g-yon du pad zla tr'am nyid las //
T02D2145:220b-37: byung ba'i yum mchog m'a ma k'i //
T02D2145:220b-38: nam mkha'i mdog can 'dzum sgeg mdzes //
T02D2145:220b-39: bum pa bsnams shing skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2145:220b-40: nub tu pad zla nyi ma yi //
T02D2145:220b-41: steng du bhr'um las 'khor lor gyur //
T02D2145:220b-42: de las snang mdzad tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:220b-43: dkar zhing skyil krung bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2145:220b-44: g-yon du pad zla mam las ni //
T02D2145:220b-45: dbyings phyug ma ni dung gi mdog /'gying bcas rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
T02D2145:220b-46: zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ngo //
T02D2145:220b-47: byang du pad zla ram nyi yi //
T02D2145:220b-48: steng du aa las rgya gram pa //
T02D2145:220b-49: de las don grub tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:220b-50: mdog ljang bum pa skyil krung mdzes //
T02D2145:220b-51: g-yon du padma zla ba'i steng //
T02D2145:221a-2: sngo ljang sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D2145:221a-4: shar khyams zla ba'i gdan stengs su //
T02D2145:221a-5: h'um bzhi rdo rje bzhir gyur pas //
T02D2145:221a-6: rdo rje rigs kyis sems dpa' bzhi //
T02D2145:221a-7: g-yas pa rang rtags rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2145:221a-8: g-yon pa tshe yi bum pa 'dzin //
T02D2145:221a-9: rgyan mdzes rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2145:221a-10: lho phyogs padma zla ba'i steng //
T02D2145:221a-11: sv'a las rin chen 'bar ba bzhi //
T02D2145:221a-12: rin chen rigs kyi sems dpar gyur //
T02D2145:221a-13: g-yas pa rin chen g-yon pa ni //
T02D2145:221a-14: tshe yi bum pa thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2145:221a-16: nub tu pad zla hr'i:bzhi las ;
T02D2145:221a-18: padma'i sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur //
T02D2145:221a-19: phyag g-yas rang rtags padma bsnams //
T02D2145:221a-20: g-yon pa bum 'dzin rgyan spras shing //
T02D2145:221a-21: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2145:221a-22: byang du gdan stengs aa bzhi las //
T02D2145:221a-23: rdo rje rgya gram las byung ba'i //
T02D2145:221a-24: las kyi sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur //
T02D2145:221a-25: sngo ljang rgya gram bum pa bsnams //
T02D2145:221a-26: gzhon sgeg mdzes shing skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2145:221a-28: shar sgor dza: dang lcags kyu las //
T02D2145:221a-29: lcags kyu ma ni mu tig mdog / lho sgor h'um las zhags pa ser //
T02D2145:221a-30: nub tu bam las lcags sgrog dmar //
T02D2145:221a-31: byang du ho:las dril bu ljang //
T02D2145:221a-32: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2145:221a-33: 'khril ldem gzhon sgeg rgyan spras mdzes //
T02D2145:221a-34: zhal ni phyir gzigs bzhengs pa'o //
T02D2145:221a-35: sgo bzhir rgyal chen bzhi yang bsam //
T02D2145:221a-36: yang na phyi rol dag tu'o //
T02D2145:221a-37: gru chad bzhi la mchod pa yi //
T02D2145:221a-38: lha mo spyi dang mthun par bsam //
T02D2145:221a-39: de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2145:221a-40: rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa //
T02D2145:221a-41: 'di brjod spyan ni drang bar bya //
T02D2145:221a-42: gdod nas rang bzhin mkha' ltar dag / thugs rjes 'ja' tshon skur ston pa'i //
T02D2145:221a-43: bcom ldan gsung mchog tshed pag med //
T02D2145:221a-44: rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas //
T02D2145:221a-47: tshe zad tshe nyams bsal mdzad phyir //
T02D2145:221a-48: gnas 'di nyid du gshegs su gsol //
T02D2145:221a-49: rdo rje rin chen padma dang //
T02D2145:221a-50: las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med //
T02D2145:221a-51: rigs kyi yum mchog lnga dang ni //
T02D2145:221a-52: mchod pa'i lha mo rnam bzhi dang //
T02D2145:221b-0: sems dpa' bcu @221b drug sgo mar bcas //
T02D2145:221b-1: rang bzhin bde chen dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D2145:221b-3: tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa dang //
T02D2145:221b-4: thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2145:221b-6: byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol //
T02D2145:221b-7: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug bcing //
T02D2145:221b-8: mnyes par gyur la mchod pa dang //
T02D2145:221b-9: bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus ba bya //
T02D2145:221b-10: sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab //
T02D2145:221b-11: de nas bying rgod rab spangs nas //
T02D2145:221b-12: ma yengs lha rnams gsal bar bsgom //
T02D2145:221b-13: de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02D2145:221b-14: lha rnams thugs ka'i bum pa'i nang //
T02D2145:221b-15: hr'i: h'um sv'a bh'um a'a: la ni ;
T02D2145:221b-16: / rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom //
T02D2145:221b-17: aom hr'i: bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2145:221b-18: aom h'um bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a //
T02D2145:221b-19: aom sv'a bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a //
T02D2145:221b-20: aom bhr'um bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a //
T02D2145:221b-21: aom a'a:bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a //
T02D2145:221b-22: de rnams yab kyi snying po'o //
T02D2145:221b-23: yum gyi bum par aa pa ri mi ta bsams la sngags 'dis bskor //
T02D2145:221b-24: aom bhr'um aa pa ri mi ta a'a yurdzny'a na
T02D2145:221b-25: su bi ni shica ta te dzo r'a dz'a ya
T02D2145:221b-26: sv'a h'a // yum mchog lnga yi snying por brjod //
T02D2145:221b-27: phyogs bzhi'i sems dpa' bcu drug po //
T02D2145:221b-28: gtso bo'i sngags rnams bskor bar bsams //
T02D2145:221b-29: dza: h'um bam ho: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yu dzny'a na su bi ni: sv'a h'a /
T02D2145:221b-30: sgo ma bzhi yi snying po'o //
T02D2145:221b-31: de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams la //
T02D2145:221b-32: dmigs nas bzlas pa byas pa yis //
T02D2145:221b-33: yig 'bru rnams las bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02D2145:221b-34: byung bas bum pa khengs par bsam //
T02D2145:221b-35: bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02D2145:221b-36: rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis //
T02D2145:221b-37: lus ngag yid gsum nad gdon dang//
T02D2145:221b-38: sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob //
T02D2145:221b-39: 'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam //
T02D2145:221b-40: de nas rang gi sngags bzla sa pas //
T02D2145:221b-41: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyang //
T02D2145:221b-42: rang rang gsang sngags zlos par bsam //
T02D2145:221b-43: rang snying sa bon shar sgo nas //
T02D2145:221b-44: lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs //
T02D2145:221b-45: dpag med shar du spros pa yis //
T02D2145:221b-46: nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas nas //
T02D2145:221b-47: dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug la //
T02D2145:221b-48: rang dang bum par bstim par bya //
T02D2145:221b-49: de bzhin lho yi zhags pa bsam //
T02D2145:221b-50: tshe dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas //
T02D2145:221b-51: gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug ste //
T02D2145:221b-52: gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya'o //
T02D2145:222a-2: srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te //
T02D2145:222a-3: chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug la //
T02D2145:222a-4: bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam //
T02D2145:222a-5: byang gi dril bu dgyes mdzad mas //
T02D2145:222a-6: nad gdon log 'dren tshar bcad nas //
T02D2145:222a-7: gnod sbyin lag nas tshe bkug la //
T02D2145:222a-8: gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim //
T02D2145:222a-9: shar phyogs rnam rgyal bum pa ni //
T02D2145:222a-10: rdzas dang mgul chings kha rgyan bcas //
T02D2145:222a-11: phyag mtshan bris nas gzhug par bya //
T02D2145:222a-12: phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la //
T02D2145:222a-13: nang ni gzhal yas khang du bsam //
T02D2145:222a-14: gong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa dgang //
T02D2145:222a-15: de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyi //
T02D2145:222a-16: nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag nas //
T02D2145:222a-17: 'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam //
T02D2145:222a-18: las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa yang //
T02D2145:222a-19: bgegs kyi steng du gzhag par bya //
T02D2145:222a-20: de yis rang gzhan bar chad bsrung //
T02D2145:222a-21: bdud rtsi dkar dmar khrus bya'o //
T02D2145:222a-22: de ltar rang don gzhan don la //
T02D2145:222a-23: ma yengs bskyed rim gsal po yis //
T02D2145:222a-24: zla ba gcig tu sngags bzlas nas //
T02D2145:222a-25: rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mthong 'gyur //
T02D2145:222a-26: de yang rgyun du nyams len na //
T02D2145:222a-27: khva da'i skad kyis mnon par //
T02D2145:222a-28: mdun du gtso bo yab yum bsam //
T02D2145:222a-29: gsol ba btab la mchod bstod bya //
T02D2145:222a-30: bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni //
T02D2145:222a-31: aom a'a yu dhe sa ra ha ka ra re sha ra re h'um //
T02D2145:222a-32: gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas //
T02D2145:222a-33: de yis bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas //
T02D2145:222a-34: rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis //
T02D2145:222a-35: nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag nas //
T02D2145:222a-36: bdud rtsis rang lus khengs pa yis //
T02D2145:222a-37: 'chi med tshe yi dngos grub thob //
T02D2145:222a-38: tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam //
T02D2145:222a-39: brtan pa'i yan lag sngags bzlas so //
T02D2145:222a-40: aom a'a yu aa ma ra na dz'i banti ye sv'a h'a //
T02D2145:222a-41: de yi tshe tshad nyi zlar 'gyur //
T02D2145:222a-42: che nyams la sogs smos ci dgos //
T02D2145:222a-43: gsang nas sgrub pa rab tu bsngags //
T02D2145:222a-44: de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya //
T02D2145:222a-46: yab lnga sku mdog 'tsher zhing dmar //
T02D2145:222a-47: sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
T02D2145:222a-48: bum pa thod par bcas pa 'dzin //
T02D2145:222a-49: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa'o ;
T02D2145:222a-50: / yum lnga sku mdog 'dra ba dang //
T02D2145:222a-51: gzhon sgreg rgyan mdzes sku sha rgyas //
T02D2145:222a-53: g-yas pa padma rdo rje dang //
T02D2145:222a-54: rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram ste //
T02D2145:222a-56: g-yon pa thod pa bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D2145:222a-57: yab la stobs shing skyil krung 'khril //
T02D2145:222b-0: @222b yab kyi 'od zer dmar ba'i mdangs //
T02D2145:222b-2: snyoms 'jug zag med bde bas rgyas //
T02D2145:222b-3: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor mtshams nas //
T02D2145:222b-4: byang sems dkar dmar bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02D2145:222b-5: rang gi gnas gsum phog pa yis //
T02D2145:222b-6: lus ngag yid gsum sdig sgrib dag / thun mong ma yin dbang bzhi thob //
T02D2145:222b-7: rang lus zag med bde bas rgyas //
T02D2145:222b-8: ye shes lus la mgon por bskyed //
T02D2145:222b-9: shar gyi khyams su rdo rje'i rigs //
T02D2145:222b-10: khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D2145:222b-11: mdog dmar phyag g-yas rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2145:222b-12: g-yon pa r'a ga'i bum pa 'dzin //
T02D2145:222b-13: sprul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan //
T02D2145:222b-14: me ri 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
T02D2145:222b-15: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o //
T02D2145:222b-16: yum yang mdog dmar rdo rje dang //
T02D2145:222b-18: khro zhing cung zad sgeg par bsam //
T02D2145:222b-19: lho phyogs su ni rin chen rigs //
T02D2145:222b-20: yab yum g-yas pa rin po che //
T02D2145:222b-21: g-yon pa tshe yi bum pa'o //
T02D2145:222b-22: nub phyogs buddha'i khro bo ni //
T02D2145:222b-23: yab yum g-yas pa 'khor lo ste //
T02D2145:222b-24: g-yon pa tshe yi bum pa'o //
T02D2145:222b-25: byang phyogs phrin las khro bo ni //
T02D2145:222b-26: yab yum g-yas pa rgya gram bsnams //
T02D2145:222b-28: dbus kyi steng dang 'og tu ni //
T02D2145:222b-29: khro bo yab yum phyag g-yas na //
T02D2145:222b-31: g-yon pa tshe yi bum pa'o //
T02D2145:222b-32: phyogs bzhir khro bo gnyis gnyis bsgom //
T02D2145:222b-33: rgyan dang cha lugs sku mdog / shar phyogs bzhin du bsam par bya //
T02D2145:222b-34: sgo ma bzhi ni mdog dmar zhing //
T02D2145:222b-35: zhal ni phyir gzigs khro mo'o //
T02D2145:222b-36: gtso bo lnga dang khrus chu yi //
T02D2145:222b-37: bum pa bdag la dmigs byas nas //
T02D2145:222b-38: gsang ba'i sngags ni bzlas par bya //
T02D2145:222b-39: aom hr'i: h'um sv'a a'a: bh'um dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D2145:222b-40: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yu dzny'a na ma
T02D2145:222b-41: ha siddhi ha sa ni ri sv'a h'a //
T02D2145:222b-42: de skad ma ma yengs bzlas pa yis //
T02D2145:222b-43: bum pa'i chu rgyun spyi bor phog / sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob //
T02D2145:222b-44: de nas rang nyid yab yum du //
T02D2145:222b-45: bsams la gsang ba'i sngags brjod do //
T02D2145:222b-46: shar dang byang shar mtshams su ni //
T02D2145:222b-47: bum pa lha rnams gong bzhin bsam //
T02D2145:222b-48: rang dang lha rnams sngags bzlas pas //
T02D2145:222b-49: 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa khengs //
T02D2145:222b-50: rjes su chags rnams zhu ba'i chus //
T02D2145:222b-51: rang gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o //
T02D2145:223a-0: de yis mchog dang thun mong gi / dngos @223a * //
T02D2145:223a-2: de nas kho na nyid 'di bgrub //
T02D2145:223a-3: rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yi //
T02D2145:223a-4: gsang gnas chos 'byung gru gsum du //
T02D2145:223a-5: hr'i: dang ram las me 'bar bas //
T02D2145:223a-6: khog pa'i nad rnams thams cad khengs //
T02D2145:223a-7: spyi bo'i ham brgyad zhu ba las //
T02D2145:223a-8: bde chen bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bab //
T02D2145:223a-9: rtsa rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas //
T02D2145:223a-10: drod dang bde ba'i khyad par kun //
T02D2145:223a-11: steng 'og rlung gi gnad shes bya //
T02D2145:223a-12: rta bdun ri bong rgyas brtan nas //
T02D2145:223a-13: mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob //
T02D2145:223a-14: bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D2145:223a-15: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
